CONF-FILE.name: event.filters
CONF-FILE.description: Description for event.filters

CONF-FILE.name: launcher_conf.txt
CONF-FILE.description: jta.jar added for AppJavaOption in launcher_conf.txt AdventNetSnmp.jar is added to the classpath list of Migration Wizard

CONF-FILE.name: NmsProcessesBE.conf
CONF-FILE.description: Added options for DISCOVER_BC_RESP_IPS (To enable discovery of devices that respond to broadcast alone). STOP_BC_FOR_NETWORKS (To stop the broadcast sent during the discovery of the network when a range of ipaddress is specified in seed.file). ENABLE_SP_FOR_MO_RELATIONS (To enable status propagation for ManagedObject relations ) arguments in the comment line. Performance Management parameters - BULK_INSERT_INTERVAL and MAX_ALLOWABLE_INSERT (are added to implement bulk insertion of collected data in the database) STATUS_POLL_DELAY (to configure the startup delay in status polling) DATA_COLLECTION_SNMP_TIMEOUT (to specify data collection time out in seconds) DATA_COLLECTION_STARTUP_DELAY (to specify data collection startup time in seconds)

COMMENT.original: java com.adventnet.nms.topodb.DBServer [TOPO_OBJECTS_IN_MEMORY number] [LOCK_CLASS LockClassName] [LOCK_TIMEOUT number] [TOPO_JDBC true/false] [MANAGE_OTHER_NETWORKS true/false] [SUPPRESS_INFO_EVENTS true/false] [ENABLE_SP_FOR_IFC_PARENTS true/false] [DISCOVER_OTHER_NETWORKS true/false]
COMMENT.updated: java com.adventnet.nms.topodb.DBServer [TOPO_OBJECTS_IN_MEMORY number] [LOCK_CLASS LockClassName] [LOCK_TIMEOUT number] [TOPO_JDBC true/false] [MANAGE_OTHER_NETWORKS true/false] [SUPPRESS_INFO_EVENTS true/false] [ENABLE_SP_FOR_IFC_PARENTS true/false] [DISCOVER_OTHER_NETWORKS true/false] [DISCOVER_BC_RESP_IPS true/false] [STOP_BC_FOR_NETWORKS true/false] [ENABLE_SP_FOR_MO_RELATIONS NONE/MAX/LATEST]

java com.adventnet.nms.security.authorization.NmsAuthManager [ AuthorizationEngineImpl ] [ AuthorizationAdminImpl ] [ time_interval_for_security_scheduler in ms ] [ change_password_for_firsttime_login ]

COMMENT.original: java com.adventnet.nms.poll.Collector [POLL_OBJECTS_IN_MEMORY num] [POLL_JDBC true/false] [CLEAN_DATA_INTERVAL num_days] [STATUS_POLL_PING_RETRIES num] [STATUS_POLL_SNMP_RETRIES num] [DATA_COLLECTION_SNMP_RETRIES num] [MAX_OIDS_IN_ONE_POLL num] [CUSTOMIZED_DATA_COLLECTOR classname] [POLLING_POLICY_CUSTOMIZER classname] [DEBUGGING_MODE true/false] [SEND_MULTIPLE_REQUEST true/false] [STATUS_POLL_QUERY_INTERVAL milliseconds] [DATA_COLLECTION_QUERY_INTERVAL milliseconds] [AUTHORIZATION true/false] [PASS_THRO_ALL_POLLING_OBJECTS true/false]
COMMENT.updated: java com.adventnet.nms.poll.Collector [POLL_OBJECTS_IN_MEMORY num] [POLL_JDBC true/false] [CLEAN_DATA_INTERVAL num_days] [STATUS_POLL_PING_RETRIES num] [STATUS_POLL_SNMP_RETRIES num] [DATA_COLLECTION_SNMP_RETRIES num] [MAX_OIDS_IN_ONE_POLL num] [CUSTOMIZED_DATA_COLLECTOR classname] [POLLING_POLICY_CUSTOMIZER classname] [DEBUGGING_MODE true/false] [SEND_MULTIPLE_REQUEST true/false] [STATUS_POLL_QUERY_INTERVAL milliseconds] [DATA_COLLECTION_QUERY_INTERVAL milliseconds] [AUTHORIZATION true/false] [PASS_THRO_ALL_POLLING_OBJECTS true/false] [RECOVER_DELETED_PDATAS true/false] [BULK_INSERT_INTERVAL seconds] [MAX_ALLOWABLE_INSERT num] [STATUS_POLL_DELAY seconds] [DATA_COLLECTION_SNMP_TIMEOUT seconds] [DATA_COLLECTION_STARTUP_DELAY seconds]

ARGS.original: POLL_OBJECTS_IN_MEMORY 25 POLL_JDBC true MAX_OIDS_IN_ONE_POLL 15 AUTHORIZATION true DATA_COLLECTION_QUERY_INTERVAL 120000
ARGS.updated: POLL_OBJECTS_IN_MEMORY 25 POLL_JDBC true MAX_OIDS_IN_ONE_POLL 15 AUTHORIZATION true DATA_COLLECTION_QUERY_INTERVAL 120000

CONF-FILE.name: serverparameters.conf
CONF-FILE.description: More entries for transaction timeout value and shutdown hook.

PARAMETER_ADDED.COMMENTS: For enable or disable shutdown hook
To enable or disable status polling
To enable or disable data collection

With in a UserTransaction, how notifications to various Module Observers are to processed and handled is specified by the Notification Type. Supported values are 1 and 2 ( 1 - for NOTIFY_TIP/ 2 - for NOTIFY_TC )

CONF-FILE.name: clientparameters.conf
CONF-FILE.description: Entries added for specifing compiled mibs and Lockout duration and termination period.

PARAMETER_ADDED.COMMENTS: For loading compiled mibs initially in MibBrowser
To configure the client lockout period
To configure the client termination period
Shows the url for logo in jsp pages
Parameter decides whether direct access of jsp page should be shown in frames/noframes. Default is noframes
Time zone preference defined to be Client default
To configure the maximum number of log files that can be created under client logs directory
To configure the maximum number of lines that can be present in each log file
To configure the name of client logs directory

PARAMETER_UPDATED.COMMENTS: jta20.jar added to the archive list

CONF-FILE.description: This will put a entry named appliation/x-java-jnlp-file JNLP in apache/conf/mime.types

CONF-FILE.name: startApplicationClient
CONF-FILE.description: This will include jnlp.jar in the class path of startApplicationClient.bat/startApplicationClient.sh .To append SmartUpdateManager classes into the client class path and changes for invoking the UpdateManager Process

UPDATE_BATCH_FILE.java: :start,set clientexit=%errorlevel%,if %clientexit% NEQ 126 goto end,%JAVA_HOME%\bin\java -classpath %UPDATE_MANAGER_CLASSPATH% com.adventnet.tools.update.installer.UpdateManager -u conf -h %NMS_HOME% -c,set umexit=%errorlevel%,if %umexit% EQU 0 goto start

CONF-FILE.name: configprovider.xml
CONF-FILE.description: To provide CORBA Southbound support for discovery, polling, configuration etc. This adds the Config Provider for CORBA to do configuration and provisioning. See also discovery.filters, Polling.conf and corbaseed.file.

PARAMETER_ADDED.COMMENTS: For Adding the Corba Config Provider.

CONF-FILE.name: discovery.filters
CONF-FILE.description: To provide CORBA Southbound support for discovery, polling, configuration etc. This adds the Corba Discovery Filter to create custom map to view CORBA Nodes. See also configprovider.xml, Polling.conf and corbaseed.file.To provide TL1 Terminal Server support.

PARAMETER_ADDED.COMMENTS: For Adding the Corba Discovery Filter .
For Adding the TL1 Gateway Discovery Filter .

CONF-FILE.name: Polling.conf
CONF-FILE.description: To provide CORBA Southbound support for discovery, polling, configuration etc. This adds the Poll Provider for CORBA to do data collection. See also configprovider.xml, discovery.filters and corbaseed.file .

PARAMETER_ADDED.COMMENTS: For Adding the Poll Provider for CORBA.
